name: start_negotiation
description: Start a 1-on-1 negotiation session with a counterparty agent. This will run the full negotiation loop until completion (deal reached, cancelled, or max rounds). The negotiation agent you configured will handle decisions within the session.

counterparty_endpoint.description: A2A endpoint URL of the counterparty agent (e.g., 'http://seller:8001')

item.description: Item to negotiate. Must include: id, name, description. Optional: category, metadata

max_rounds.description: Maximum negotiation rounds before giving up (optional, default: 100)

name: start_auction
description: Start a multi-party auction session with multiple participants. The auction will run for the specified number of rounds, collecting bids from all participants, then determine a winner.

counterparty_endpoints.description: List of participant A2A endpoint URLs

item.description: Item to auction. Must include: id, name, description

round_duration.description: Duration of each round in seconds (default: 60)

name: get_session_status
description: Get the current status of a session including state, role, and item info

name: list_active_sessions
description: List all currently active sessions with their basic info

name: list_remote_agents
description: List all connected remote agents that can be contacted for negotiations or auctions
